body.p: Consequently, the entity concludes that the criteria in paragraph B58 of IFRS 15 are met and that the nature of the entity’s promise to transfer the licence is to provide the customer with access to the entity’s intellectual property as it exists throughout the licence period. Consequently, the entity accounts for the promised licence as a performance obligation satisfied over time (ie the criterion in paragraph 35(a) of IFRS 15 is met).
